raw_title: REV. SISTER MARY PERPETUAL SUCCOUR ZOYZA
raw_body: REV. SISTER MARY PERPETUAL SUCCOUR ZOYZA expired. Her mortal remains laid to rest at St. Agnes’ Convent,​ Bolawalana,​ Negombo till 3.30 p.m. on Sunday 15th October and thereafter will be taken to Good Shepherd Convent,​ Nayakakanda. The Eucharistic Celebration on Monday 16th at 3.00 p.m. followed by burial.066472
